document.full_text: the nfl commissioner roger goodell sent a letter directly to players and their agents on thursday, urging them and their union (nflpa) to return to the negotiating table.
document.title: nfl commissioner urges players to resume talks
lines_and_colors: the nfl commissioner roger goodell sent a letter directly to players and their agents on thursday, urging them and their union (nflpa) to return to the negotiating table.
